properties.address: Burnham on Crouch URC, Essex CM0 8HF
properties.description: Open to all. Visits from community agencies that can give support and signpost. Links to the Dengie Food Pantry. Space to chat and craft, have a cuppa and some cake.

properties.address: St Nicholas Church Tillingham, Southminster, Essex CM0 7SU
properties.description: This warm friendly space is open to all every Thursday morning for coffee from 10.00am. From November to March we provide home made hot soup and rolls at 12 noon. There is no charge - donations are welcome but not expected.
properties.title: St Nicholas Church Coffee and Soup
